content: Another attack he employs frequently begins when he pivots his body by spinning into an over the shoulder claw swipe, which he’ll quickly follow through by swiping back upwards, and then kick outward after a short delay. You can parry the first below with Rock Solid when you see him spin to completely throw him off of the whole combo.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard_(Kingdom_of_Sahali).md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard (Kingdom of Sahali)', specifically from the subsection '"Tiger Vanguard" Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Another attack he employs frequently begins when he pivots his body by spinning into an over the shoulder claw swipe, which he’ll quickly follow through by swiping back upwards, and then kick outward after a short delay. You can parry the first below with Rock Solid when you see him spin to completely throw him off of the whole combo.
